extendedInfo.description: Always know exactly when to pray with the Belal app for your smartphone/tablet. Itâs simple to use, easy to configure and has many helpful features.Exploiting your mobile network data and internal GPS, it will always know your exact location, so you can be guaranteed accurate prayer times. Youâll be also shown Qibla, which is useful when youâre out and about.Great features include an overview of each prayer and the possibility to query expired prayer times throughout the year. After the Athan, a graphic countdown will inform about the coming of the next prayer.Features* Prayer time alerts (Fajr, Duhr, Asr, Maghrib & Isha) with Athan* Special prayer-related alerts (Tahajud, Al Gouwda and  Emsak) with recitation of  relevant verses from the Holy Quran* Shurukh Indication* Qiblah direction finder* Shows prayer times, with a countdown to the next prayer* Query Prayer and Prayer related times for any day of the year* Awqaf (Official) Prayer and Shurukh times built-in, for important world cities* Integrates comprehensive methods for calculation of Prayer and Shurukh times using geographical information of a location together with localized prayer time parameters. * Available sources of geographical information:  - Built-in location information of selected world cities  - Location information obtained from satellites (with optional GPS module)  - Manually defined* Dual Calendar Display (Hijri & Gregorian calendar)* Set your own standard and optional prayer alerts* Normal clock times and dates* Multi-lingual user interface -  English, French, Arabic and Urdu* Choose from different Athans* Mute function

reviews.title: Great app, BUT
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t allow to choose when you can hear the Adhan. It is either all on or all off. During Dhuhr and Asr I\'m either at work or in class. So can\'t have it on then, but would like to hear it during Fajr and Ishaa. Hopefully you can fix it because I really love this app.  Jazakallah Khair
reviews.author: Mamkumba Sosseh

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Really good app.... I just wish for a few features.... Instead of Adhan as the alarm sound, can we use custom sound too? And also please add widgets!!
reviews.author: Akbar Khan

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Graphics are awesome, the athan sound(libian) is great and new for most of us. This is a great app overall, although it\'s missing a widget, and it doesn\'t give you an option to chose the calculation method, i\'m not sure if the developer already does that automatically according to the location, but it should be an option. Thank you very much.
reviews.author: Amro Osama

reviews.title: Excellent app, but...
reviews.comment: Please update the app so we can select which prayer times to play. I love the app but the restriction to listen to all 5 alarms is making it frustrating. Also please give volume bar to each Adhan alarm so we can set how loud or low the adhan can play. Please update it. I dnt wanna uninstall for such a minor problem.
reviews.author: Murtaza Ali Lehri

reviews.title: Great app, but...
reviews.comment: Please add back my old Azan or at least fix the current one so that the fajr azan is proper. Thanks. Also there may be a battery drain issue with nexus 4, disable constant GPS tracking.
reviews.author: Sarim Ali

reviews.title: Spot on !!!
reviews.comment: very pleased whith the accuracy of prayer time calculation :)
reviews.author: Mo Goujane

reviews.title: Great and aesthetically pleasing
reviews.comment: Wonderful app. Love the tahajjud alarm. May Allah reward the developers. However wish there was a way to segregate the alarms instead of all or none. I live next to a masjid and dont need the alarms operating for each prayer, only for a few. Please implement in next update. Jazakallah khayr
reviews.author: Hammad Rizwan

reviews.title: MASHAHALLAH
reviews.comment: May Almighty ALLAH reward you for the hard work. Its a great app. with almost perfect accuracy except 2 to 3 minutes diff. in adan timings. But this app is the best I have ever seen with such accuracy. All others would show altogether wrong adan timings. Also the other alerts etc are very useful and gives the feeling to pray nawafeel if one does nt practice it anyway. All our family members hv this app in their mobiles and I strongly reccomend it to others. thanks.
reviews.author: Shakira Khanum

reviews.title: Good timing
reviews.comment: The time is exactly and as dubai time. I hope they reduce the app size.  Need some widgets.  I like it...
reviews.author: Mohammad Tawash

reviews.title: Nice but late one hour !
reviews.comment: In Sydney... Please help!  Late one hour!
reviews.author: Sigita Puodziuniene

reviews.title: Eat battery
reviews.comment: Generally good. But eat my mobile battery. Sorry have to uninstall it.
reviews.author: Hasan A Yousef

reviews.title: Tangerang error
reviews.comment: When i were in Soekarno Hatta int airport, it was set automatically to \"Tangerang\", but the prayer time wasn\'t on the right schedule. May u the developer check it? May be it because of your database error (latitude setting). Thnx.
reviews.author: Reza Hakim

reviews.title: Excellent for muslims
reviews.comment: Amazing ap but some location not show kindly fix the problem
reviews.author: Reyazislah Ahmad

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: Can\'t expect a better application. Everything is perfect... May Allah reward you!
reviews.author: Sharjeel Aalim

reviews.title: Very useful app
reviews.comment: Mobile azahan. Very useful to pray namaz in buzy life       I
reviews.author: ismail kader
